import React from "react"; import { Navigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Default from '../../assets/images/default.jpeg' import MainHeader from "../MainHeader/MainHeader"; import styles from './profile.module.scss' import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import infoName from '../../assets/images/info_name.png' import infoEmail from '../../assets/images/info_email.png' import infoRegion from '../../assets/images/info_region.png' const Profile = () => { const { user: currentUser } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); console.log(currentUser) const { t } = useTranslation(); let myID = currentUser.id let regions = { "Баткен": 1, "Жалал-Абад": 2, "Нарын": 3, "Ош": 4, "Талас": 5, "Чүй": 6, "Ысык-Көл": 7 } let filteredRegions = Object.keys(regions).filter((key) => regions[key] === myID); if (!currentUser) { return ; } return (
{!currentUser.profile_picture ? ( ) : ( ) }

{currentUser.last_name} {currentUser.first_name}

{currentUser.email}

{t('user_name')}

{currentUser.last_name} {currentUser.first_name}

Регион

{filteredRegions.join(', ')}

{t('reg_password')}

********

E-mail

{currentUser.email}

); }; export default Profile;
